bike.description: OCLV Mountain Carbon main frame, w/alloy chainstay and seatstay, Carbon Armor, ABP Convert, Full Floater, E2 tapered head tube, internal front der cable routing, magnesium EVO Link, oversized pivot bearings, replaceable derailleur hanger, 120mm travel

components.description: Bontrager Rhythm Comp Disc wheel system,15mm front hub, 142x12mm rear hub, Tubeless Ready
Bontrager Race Lite Low Riser, 31.8mm, 15mm rise, 9 degree sweep
Cane Creek IS-3, E2, alloy cartridge
Shimano SLX M666 hydraulic disc brakes
Trek fork and shock sag meter, Bontrager shock pump
